messages.messageBody:
Hi Danielle!

I "know" you from the Unschooling Discussion list and think you'll love
this one. :) I so wish that I could have gone to the conference this
past weekend <sniff> but it wasn't meant to be this year. I'm already
saving money for the 2005 event though! ;)

-Tracy-

messages.subject: New to list--Intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All, I d like to introduce myself. My name is Danielle, and I m an unschooling mom to three amazing children: Emily 7, Julia 5 and Sam 4. We ve been
messages.messageBody:
Hello All,

I'd like to introduce myself. My name is Danielle, and I'm an
unschooling mom to three amazing children: Emily 7, Julia 5 and Sam 4.
We've been officially unschooling for the past two years and have
loved every minute of it! By next year, all three will be official
unschoolers, which is really hard to believe! You can find out all
kinds of things about us--probably more than you'd ever want to
know!--at our unschooling webpage below.

I've heard such wonderful things about this list, and everyone was
telling me at this weekend's amazing Live and Learn Conference that I
needed to get on UnschoolingBasics--so here I am! I'm looking forward
to talking with lots of new folks as well as those I recognize from
other lists.

--Danielle
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html
